chatbot_scope.purpose: Comprehensive RAG chatbot for Prime Source Global Group

documents.title: Comprehensive Company Overview
documents.content: Prime Source Global (PSG) is a diversified multinational conglomerate headquartered in Ras Al Khaimah, UAE, with significant operations in Saudi Arabia, India, and Southeast Asia. Established with a vision to lead through innovation and sustainability, PSG operates across multiple high-impact sectors: Construction & Interior Supplies, Technology (Software & AI), Digital Health, Environmental Consultancy, and Travel & Tourism. PSG prides itself on being a 'One-Stop Solution' provider, leveraging global sourcing capabilities and local expertise to deliver excellence. The company values Integrity, Excellence, Teamwork, and Sustainability.

documents.title: Business Model
documents.content: PSG's business model is built on diversification and vertical integration. 1) Trading & Sourcing: Leveraging direct relationships with manufacturers in Asia and Europe to supply high-quality timber, hardware, and construction materials at competitive prices. 2) Technology Solutions: Developing proprietary platforms (like e-Trainia) and offering bespoke software/AI services to enterprise clients. 3) Service Delivery: Providing specialized consultancy in environmental compliance and digital health operations. 4) Projects & Contracting: Executing turnkey civil, mechanical, and electrical projects in the GCC region. This multi-pillar approach ensures stability and cross-sector growth.

documents.title: Software and AI Solutions
documents.content: PSG’s Technology Division offers cutting-edge Software and AI solutions designed to drive digital transformation. Services include: 1) Custom Software Development: Tailored enterprise applications, web portals, and mobile apps. 2) Artificial Intelligence & ML: Implementing predictive analytics, natural language processing (NLP) chatbots, and automation tools. 3) ERP & LMS Implementation: Deployment and customization of enterprise resource planning and learning management systems (including e-Trainia). 4) Cloud Services & IT Infrastructure: Secure cloud migration, hosting, and IT support services. We empower businesses to optimize operations and enhance customer engagement through technology.

documents.title: Travel and Tourism Services
documents.content: PSG Travel & Tourism provides comprehensive travel management services for corporate and leisure clients. Offerings include: 1) Corporate Travel Management: End-to-end booking of flights, hotels, and transport for business trips. 2) Visa Assistance: Professional support for visa processing across various destinations. 3) Holiday Packages: Customized leisure tour packages, including adventure, luxury, and family trips. 4) MICE Services: Organization of Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions. We aim to make travel seamless, cost-effective, and memorable.

documents.title: Careers at PSG
documents.content: Join Prime Source Global (PSG) to be part of a dynamic, innovative, and growth-oriented team. We offer opportunities across various domains including Engineering, Software Development, Sales & Marketing, Supply Chain, and Administration. Why work with us? 1) Global Exposure: Work on international projects. 2) Professional Growth: Continuous learning and development programs. 3) Inclusive Culture: A diverse and supportive work environment. Interested candidates can explore current openings on our website or submit their CVs to our HR department at careers@psgbiz.com.

documents.title: Our Partners
documents.content: PSG collaborates with industry leaders to deliver the best solutions. Our ecosystem includes: 1) Technology Partners: Next Orbit Technologies (Software/EdTech), Major Cloud Providers. 2) Manufacturing Partners: Leading timber and hardware factories in Malaysia, India, Indonesia, and China. 3) Healthcare Partners: MD24 Global (Digital Health). 4) Environmental Partners: R&R Environment (Sustainability Consulting). These strategic alliances enable us to offer world-class products and services.

documents.title: Digital Health Services (Expanded)
documents.content: PSG’s Digital Health division revolutionizes healthcare administration. Services include: 1) Medical Scribing: Virtual scribes to document patient encounters in real-time, reducing physician burnout. 2) Medical Transcription: Accurate and timely transcription of dictations. 3) Medical Coding & Billing: Certified coders ensuring compliance and optimal reimbursement (ICD-10, CPT). 4) Clinical Data Management: Organizing and analyzing healthcare data for better decision-making. 5) HIPAA Compliance: All services adhere strictly to data privacy and security regulations.

documents.title: Environmental Consultancy (Expanded)
documents.content: PSG Environmental Consultancy supports sustainable development through expert guidance. Key services: 1) Environmental Impact Assessments (EIA/ESIA): Evaluating potential effects of projects before implementation. 2) Sustainability Reporting: Helping companies measure and report ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) performance. 3) Regulatory Compliance: Ensuring adherence to local and international environmental laws. 4) Waste Management Plans: Strategies for minimizing and managing industrial waste. 5) Green Building Consulting: Advice on LEED certification and energy-efficient design.

documents.title: Training and Workforce Development
documents.content: Beyond our e-Trainia platform, PSG offers strategic services in Training and Workforce Development. We partner with: 1) Training Institutes: To modernize their curriculum and delivery methods. 2) Skill Development Agencies: executing government and private skilling mandates. 3) Corporate L&D Departments: Designing bespoke training programs for employee upskilling in leadership, technical skills, and soft skills. 4) HR & Payroll Services: Offering outsourced HR operations, payroll processing, and recruitment services to streamline business operations.
